subject: 1 Receipt
body:
1 Receipt



Hello Frank Thomas,

Special Note


Thank y'all so much!

Thank you for your business. Attached to this email should be 1 Receipt for a total of: $112.50.

Details


Payment ID: 1 for $112.50 on September 14, 2022



As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $0.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Construction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
